methods.description: Get bulk object properties by given path
methods.name: GetPropertiesByPath

parameters.description: If true will return properties on specified path and all the nested paths
parameters.name: recurse

methods.description: Validate bulk properties for setting by given paths
methods.name: ValidateSetPropertiesByPath

parameters.description: The values offered (this may include read-only values and also paths which are not the target role path)
parameters.name: dataSet

parameters.description: If true will validate properties on target path and all the nested paths
parameters.name: recurse

parameters.description: If populated (not an empty collection) will exclude the properties matching any of the specified traits for validation
parameters.name: excludedPropertyTraits

methods.description: Set bulk properties by given paths
methods.name: SetPropertiesByPath

parameters.description: The values offered (this may include read-only values and also paths which are not the target role path)
parameters.name: dataSet

parameters.description: If true will set properties on target path and all the nested paths
parameters.name: recurse

parameters.description: If populated (not an empty collection) will exclude the properties matching any of the specified traits from being restored. These properties might receive values from the device instead. When populating this argument, allowIncomplete MUST be set to true
parameters.name: excludedPropertyTraits

parameters.description: If true will allow the device to restore only the role paths which pass validation (perform an incomplete restore)
parameters.name: allowIncomplete
